doc.title: My Card Active Offers List Service

resource.doc: Retrieves offers clipped to my card and still active (not expired).

param.name: hierarchies
param.doc: If hierarchies=y, then hierarchy payload that is returned in Hierarchy Service will also be returned along with this Service. But if this query parameter is omitted or if its passed as hierarchies=n, then hierarchy payload won’t be returned.

param.name: storeId
param.doc: This specified the store id for which offers will be retrived for. If store id is null or not specified it will default to the user primary store id.
